com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.utils

Class ElementLists<Rend,Pos>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.utils.ElementLists<Rend,Pos>
  • Type Parameters:
    Rend - The renderer type used by contained Drawables
    Pos - Vector type used by contained Drawables
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementLists.WithProperties

    public abstract class ElementLists<Rend,Pos>
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility that provides basic functionality for containing children of an UberDrawable. Supposed use is to make an instance of UberDrawable own a private instance of ElementLists and redirect the calls for its children lists to it. Makes sure that all the children present in the list of drawableChildren are also present in the list of children and so on. Also provides listeners to inject additional functionality for the events of a child being added, removed, usw.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    UberDrawable, BasicAbstractLayout, ObservedList

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ElementLists.Delegated<Rend,Pos>
      Variant of ElementLists that provides additional ConstPropertys encapsulating the Lists and implements the onElementAdded, onElementRemoved and onDrawableAdded abstract methods by redirecting them to corresponding newly added EventDelegates.
      static class  ElementLists.WithProperties<Rend,Pos>
      Utility that provides basic functionality for containing children of an UberDrawable.

    • Field Detail

      • elements

        public final ObservedList<Element> elements
        The list containing all the Elements, that belong to the owner UberDrawable. Calls the onElementAdded method for every new element added, onElementRemoved for every element removed or set to a different value. Makes sure that it contains all the elements in drawables and that drawables do not contain anything that is not present here. If an element of drawables is set to a different value through this list, it will always be removed from drawables without the substitute being added there, to insure type safety.
        See Also:
        ObservedList

      • drawables

        public final ObservedList<Drawable<Rend,Pos>> drawables
        The list containing all the Elements, that belong to the owner UberDrawable that implement the Drawable interface ant that are explicitly added here to be drawn on the screen. An Element can implement Drawable and be not present here if it was explicitly added only to children. Calls the onDrawableAdded method for every new Drawable added, onElementRemoved for every Drawable removed or set to a different value. Makes sure that it contains all the elements in drawables and that drawables do not contain anything that is not present here.
        See Also:
        ObservedList

      • _gen_elem_list_type

        protected <T> java.util.List<T> _gen_elem_list_type()
        Generates the instance of List to be used for elements field. By default creates new UniqueList<>(new ArrayList<>(), new HashSet<>()).
        See Also:
        UniqueList, ArrayList, HashSet

      • _gen_draw_list_type

        protected <T> java.util.List<T> _gen_draw_list_type()
        Generates the instance of List to be used for drawables field. By default directs to _gen_elem_list_type.
